Description: 1998 Jackson Kelly KE3 Electric Guitar RARE Crimson Swirl Floyd Rose MIJ Japan w/Seymour Duncan Pickups, Locking Nut, Orig Hard Case NON-PAYING BIDDERS WILL BE REPORTED TO EBAY. Inspection Report: Up for auction is a 1998 Jackson Kelly KE3 Electric Guitar RARE Crimson Swirl Floyd Rose MIJ Japan w/Seymour Duncan Pickups, Locking Nut, Orig Hard Case. Item is in previously owned condition. It has been tested and the electronics work perfectly. This is an awesome sounding guitar and the crimson swirl design is an eye-catcher! It has usual light scuffs and swirling in the finish, with a small blemish on one of the points, as pictured. It's very rare to find this minimal damage on the body or the points, so this baby was well-cared for. The action is set kind of high, it's easy enough to lower, but we will leave that for the buyer. Auction includes: 1998 Jackson Kelly KE3 Electric Guitar, Whammy Bar, Original Hard Shell Case, Case Keys, Truss Adjustment Tool and 2 Hex Keys, ONLY. As shown. Please inspect pictures as they are considered part of the item description and show the items condition for you to make an informed bid. Also, please note that I am not a musician nor an expert, I do not play the bass, so there may be issues I am unaware of. Instruments might need to be tuned and/or adjusted by a professional; all our instruments are previously owned and used. Feel free to ask any questions and I will be happy to answer them as best I can. Thanks for looking and good luck bidding. Item is in previously owned condition.
